results.message: Page detected as HTML, but does not have a 'lang' attribute
The page does not provide a way to quickly navigate to the main content (ARIA "main" landmark or a skip link)
Content is not within a landmark element
The image has neither an alt atttribute nor an ARIA label or title

html_lang_exists.0: Page must identify the default language of the document with a 'lang' attribute
html_lang_exists.Fail_3: Page detected as HTML, but does not have a 'lang' attribute

html_skipnav_exists.0: Provide a way to bypass blocks of content that are repeated on multiple Web pages

page_title_exists.0: The page should have a title that correctly identifies the subject of the page

emoticons_alt_exists.0: Emoticons must have a short text alternative that describes their purpose

img_alt_background.0: Background images that convey important information must have a text alternative that describes the image

list_markup_review.0: Use proper HTML list elements to create lists

aria_content_in_landmark.0: All content must reside within an element with a landmark role
aria_content_in_landmark.Fail_1: Content is not within a landmark element

page_title_valid.0: Page <title> should be a descriptive title, rather than a filename

skip_main_exists.0: Pages must provide a way to skip directly to the main content
skip_main_exists.Fail_1: The page does not provide a way to quickly navigate to the main content (ARIA "main" landmark or a skip link)

text_sensory_misuse.0: Instructions must be meaningful without shape or location words

text_quoted_correctly.0: Quotations should be marked with <q> or <blockquote> elements

text_whitespace_valid.0: Space characters should not be used to control spacing within a word

heading_content_exists.0: Heading elements must provide descriptive text

heading_markup_misuse.0: Heading elements must not be used for presentation

text_contrast_sufficient.0: The contrast ratio of text with its background must meet WCAG AA requirements

img_alt_misuse.0: 'alt' attribute value must be a good inline replacement for the image

img_alt_valid.0: Images require an 'alt' attribute with a short text alternative if they convey meaning, or 'alt="" if decorative
img_alt_valid.fail_no_alt: The image has neither an alt atttribute nor an ARIA label or title

aria_descendant_valid.0: Browsers ignore the explicit and implicit ARIA roles of the descendants of certain elements
